1. 修改`package.json`中的`dependencies`, 增加：
    ```
    "react-native-tv-focusable-view": "git+ssh://git@git.devops.letv.com:zhuxinliang/react-native-tv-focusable-view.git"
    ```
    然后，运行：
    ```
    npm install
    ```

2. 修改settings.gradle
    
    ```
      // file: android/settings.gradle
      ...
    
      include ':react-native-tv-focusable-view', ':app'
      project(':react-native-tv-focusable-view').projectDir = new File(rootProject.projectDir,'../node_modules/react-native-tv-focusable-view')
    ```
  
3. 更新app Gradle Build

    ```
      // file: android/app/build.gradle
      ...
    
      dependencies {
          ...
          compile project(':react-native-tv-focusable-view')
      }
    ```
  
4. 注册React Package，修改`MainApplication.java`

    ```
      import com.letv.rn.focusableView.LeTvPackage;
      ...
      @Override
        protected List<ReactPackage> getPackages() {
          return Arrays.<ReactPackage>asList(
              new MainReactPackage(),
              new LeTvPackage() // add this
          );
        }
    ```
  
    5.在js中使用`FocusableView`
    
    
    `FocusableView`是一个HOC组件，被包裹的组件拥有了`focus`属性，表明当前view是否拥有焦点
    ```
    import React from 'react';
    import {
      Animated,
      Image,
      Text,
      StyleSheet,
      View,
    } from 'react-native';
    
    var FocusableView = require('react-native-tv-focusable-view');
    
    class Demo extends React.Component {
      constructor() {
        super();
      }
    
      render() {
        let wrapperStyle = [styles.wrapper];
        if(this.props.focus){
          wrapperStyle.push(styles.focus);
        }
    
        let titleStyle = this.props.focus ? styles.titleFocus : styles.titleNormal;
    
        return (
          <View style={wrapperStyle} >
            <Text style={titleStyle} numberOfLines={2} ellipsizeMode={'tail'}>{this.props.title}</Text>
          </View>
        );
      }
    }
    
    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
      wrapper: {
        flexDirection: 'column',
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        backgroundColor: '#069ff1',
        height: 160,
        width: 200
      },
    
      focus: {
        borderWidth: 2,
        borderRadius: 9,
        borderColor: '#eee',
        overflow: 'hidden'
      },
    
      blur: {
        borderWidth: 0
      },
    
      titleNormal: {
        height: 40,
        textAlign: 'center',
        color: '#666',
        fontSize: 20
      },
    
      titleFocus: {
        height: 40,
        // lineHeight: 20,
        textAlign: 'center',
        color: '#fff',
        fontSize: 20
      }
    });
    
    module.exports = FocusableView(Demo, true);

    ```
